post.summary: Creates a new Application within a View.
post.description: Creates a new Application within a View with the attributes specified. An Application Template is a top-level resource that can optionally be the parent of an View specific Application resource, which would inherit it's properties

get.summary: Gets all Applications for a View.
get.description: Returns all Applications assigned to a specific View.

post.summary: Creates a new Application Instance within a Team.
post.description: Creates a new Application Instance within a Team with the attributes specified

get.summary: Gets all Applications Instances for a Team.
get.description: Returns all Application Instances assigned to a specific Team.

post.description: Creates a new Application Template with the attributes specified. An Application Template is a top-level resource that can optionally be the parent of an View specific Application resource, which would inherit it's properties

get.summary: Gets all Application Templates in the system.
get.description: Returns a list of all of the Application Templates in the system.

delete.description: Deletes an Application with the specified id.

put.description: Updates an Application with the attributes specified

get.summary: Gets a specific Application by id.
get.description: Returns the Application with the id specified.

delete.description: Deletes an Application Instance with the specified id.

put.description: Updates an Application Instance with the attributes specified.

get.summary: Gets a specific Application Instance by id.
get.description: Returns the Application Instance with the id specified.

delete.description: Deletes an Application Template with the specified id.

put.description: Updates an Application Template with the attributes specified

get.summary: Gets a specific Application Template by id.
get.description: Returns the Application Template with the id specified.

get.summary: Export Application Templates.
get.description: Returns an archive of Application Templates and supporting files.

post.description: Import Application Templates
Moves an Application Instance up one spot in the list.
Moves an Application Instance down one spot in the list.
File objects will be returned in the same order as their respective files within the form.

get.summary: Get all files in the system
Get all files in a view accessable to the calling user
Get all files in a team
Get a specific file by id

put.description:
Takes a form with fields for team IDs and a new file. File can be assigned to different teams and/or replaced.
           The file entry will be changed to point at the newly uploaded file.

get.summary: Download a file by id
get.description: This endpoint downloads the actual file, files/{fileId} returns the DB entry for a file

get.summary: Checks the liveliness health endpoint
get.description: Returns a HealthStatus of the liveliness health check

get.summary: Checks the readiness health endpoint
get.description: Returns a HealthStatus of the readiness health check

post.summary: Adds a Permission to a Role.
post.description: Adds the specified Permission to the specified Role.

delete.summary: Removes a Permission from a Role.
delete.description: Removes the specified Permission from the specified Role.

post.description: Creates a new Permission with the attributes specified.

get.summary: Gets all Permissions in the system.
get.description: Returns a list of all of the Permissions in the system.

delete.description: Deletes a Permission with the specified id.

put.description: Updates a Permission with the attributes specified

get.summary: Gets a specific Permission by id.
get.description: Returns the Permission with the id specified.

get.summary: Gets System Permissions for the current User.
get.description: Returns all System Permissions for the current user.

post.description: Creates a new Role with the attributes specified.

get.summary: Gets all Roles in the system.
get.description: Returns a list of all of the Roles in the system.

delete.description: Deletes a Role with the specified id.

put.description: Updates a Role with the attributes specified.

get.summary: Gets a specific Role by id.
get.description: Returns the Role with the id specified.

get.summary: Gets a specific Role by name.
get.description: Returns the Role with the name specified.

post.summary: Creates a new Team within a View.
post.description: Creates a new Team within a View with the attributes specified.

get.summary: Gets all Teams for a View.
get.description: Returns all Teams within a specific View.

delete.description: Deletes a Team with the specified id.

put.description: Updates a Team with the attributes specified.

get.summary: Gets a specific Team by id.
get.description: Returns the Team with the id specified.

get.summary: Gets all Teams in the system.
get.description: Returns a list of all of the Teams in the system.

get.summary: Gets all Teams for a User by View.
get.description: Returns all Teams within a specific View that a User is a member of.

get.summary: Gets all Teams for the current User by View.
get.description: Returns all Teams within a specific View that the current User is a member of.

post.description: Broadcasts a Notification to all members of the specified Team.
Sets the specified Team as a Primary Team for the specified User.

put.description: Updates a Team Membership with the attributes specified.

get.summary: Gets a specific Team Membership by id.
get.description: Returns the Team Membership with the id specified.

get.summary: Gets all Team Memberships for a User by View.
get.description: Returns a list of all of the Team Memberships for a User in the specified View.

post.summary: Adds a Team Permission to a Team Role.
post.description: Adds the specified TeamPermission to the specified Team Role.

delete.summary: Removes a Team Permission from a Team Role.
delete.description: Removes the specified TeamPermission from the specified Team Role.

post.summary: Adds a Team Permission to a Team.
post.description: Adds the specified TeamPermission to the specified Team.

delete.summary: Removes a Team Permission from a Team.
delete.description: Removes the specified TeamPermission from the specified Team.

delete.description: Deletes a TeamPermission with the specified id.

put.description: Updates a TeamPermission with the attributes specified

get.summary: Gets a specific Team Permission by id.
get.description: Returns the Team Permission with the id specified.

get.summary: Gets Team Permissions for the current User.
get.description:
Returns all TeamPermissions for the current user or those of a specified Team or View.
                        If a Team is specified, can optionally include TeamPermissions for all Teams in the same View that the User is a member of.

post.description: Creates a new Team Role with the attributes specified.

get.description: Returns the Team Role with the id specified.

delete.summary: Removes a User from a Team.
delete.description: Removes the specified User from the specified Team.

post.description: Creates a new User with the attributes specified.

get.summary: Gets all Users in the system.
get.description: Returns a list of all of the Users in the system.

delete.description: Deletes a User with the specified id.

put.description: Updates a User with the attributes specified.

get.summary: Exports Views.
get.description: Exports the specified Views, or all Views if none specified.

get.description: Returns all Views where the specified User is a member of at least one of it's Teams.

post.description: Creates a subscription to send specified events to the target.

delete.description: Deletes the Webhook Subscription with the specified id.

put.description: Updates a Webhook Subscription with the attributes specified.

patch.description: Partially updates a Webhook Subscription with the attributes specified.

get.summary: Gets all Webhook Subscriptions in the system.
get.description: Returns a list of all of the Webhook Subscriptions in the system.
